title: Green Lotus
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Chinese, Thai, Delivery, Take-out, Malaysian, South-East Asian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small eat-in or take out restaurant with a very clean and welcoming atmosphere. Their menu has a  variety of standard dishes with no faux meats. In many dishes, tofu is offered as its main protein. Serves many varieties of bubble tea, many without dairy. Satellite tv and Wi-Fi inside restaurant.
